keywords: ['soul/r&b', 'passionate male vocal', 'shimmering hi hats', 'energetic crash cymbal', 'wide acoustic rhythm guitar melody', 'shimmering shakers', 'snappy snare', 'piano chords', 'mellow bass', 'passionate', 'romantic']
caption: The Soul/R&B song features a passionate male vocal singing over shimmering hi hats, energetic crash cymbals, wide acoustic rhythm guitar melody, shimmering shakers, snappy snare, piano chords and mellow bass. It sounds passionate and romantic - like something you would sing to your partner.
